religion: Tengriism, Shamanism, and later Judaism   and Islam Galina M. Yemelianova, ''Russia and Islam: A Historical Survey'', Palgrave Macmillan, 2002, ISBN 9780333683545, p. 3. "By the end of the eighth century the Khazar capital, Itil', and other Khazar towns had mosques... The military guard of the Khagan were predominantly Muslim."
